text: ‘Ārau ma'i niścaẏa siham̐taka pathabhraṣṭa karaima, ārau araśyē siham̐tara hr̥daẏata michā bāsanāra sr̥ṣṭi karaima, ārau araśyē ma'i siham̐taka nirdēśa karaima phalata siham̐tē paśura kāṇa phuṭā karaiba, ārau araśyē ma'i siham̐taka nirdēśa karaima phalata siham̐tē āllāhara sr̥ṣṭi bikr̥ta karaiba’. Āllāhara paraibartē kōnōbā'i caẏatānaka abhibhārakaraūpē grahaṇa karailē si araśyē spaṣṭa kṣatigrasta haẏa
